meanings.definition: The act or process of giving birth to a baby.
meanings.sent1: Childbirth can be a joyful experience for many families.
meanings.sent2: The hospital was prepared for the upcoming childbirth.
meanings.sent3: The childbirth scene in the movie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her determination during childbirth was like a warrior in battle.
meanings.sent5: The miracle of childbirth is a beautiful thing to witness.

meanings.definition: The time when a woman gives birth to a baby.
meanings.sent1: The doctor arrived just in time for the childbirth.
meanings.sent2: She was in labor for hours before the childbirth finally happened.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected childbirth caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The anticipation before childbirth is like waiting for a new chapter to begin.
meanings.sent5: The support of loved ones during childbirth can make all the difference.
